code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import ArbitrageTable from'./components/ArbitrageTable';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[opportunities,setOpportunities]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchOpportunities=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/api/opportunities');setOpportunities(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching opportunities:',error);}};fetchOpportunities();const intervalId=setInterval(fetchOpportunities,5000);return()=>clearInterval(intervalId);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Arbitrage Opportunities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArbitrageTable,{opportunities:opportunities})]});}export default App;
